Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, east of Maria's Market.
Room.LongDescription: There is a small, open-air market to the west where you can purchase a number of small commodities, such as wheat, grain, corn, some fruits and vegetables, and some meat products. The large market is run by Maria, who also buys grains and other supplies that might be used elsewhere.
